title: I’m Really A Great Director - Novel Updates
tags: Alternate World   Game Elements   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Movies   Showbiz   Transported to Another World
author: Flying Thousands Of Miles   飞骑千里
description:
In a parallel universe, the production of movies has become extremely simplified. With images in the brain, and through the use of “Phantom Capture Head Rig”, exquisite scenes are formed!

As a rabid fan of movies, numerous works of masters in this world of ours have been stored inside the mind of the transmigrated Li Fanxi. 

'Inception'
'Fight Club'
'Iron Man'
'Triangle'
'Ring'
…

These classic movies have yet to appear in the parallel universe!

The road to the greatest director, unfolds in full swing!>
